name: Bonsai Fusion Steakhouse
description: A responsive website created from the ground up leveraging React for a local restaurant in Houston, Tx. Added functionality to display estimate of price cost for customers, as well as adding functionality to email the restaurant. Constantly updated to meet business/leadership standards

name: YouTube Clone
description: This project was created only by using EJS, a backend template that allows us to render webpages. In here, we were able to learn more about MongoDB which is a database that works with unrelational data types. We were able to create various schemas and have them populate with one another to create relationships.

name: FFVII RPG GAME
description: A small interactive game based on Final Fantasy 7. Users will use attacks, magic, heals to survive the battle. Created with Javascript, I made character classes and assigned them various values. I would also create multiple callback functions that will determine that action of each individual characters. Wanting to display various damage I created a math formula that would take the input of their maximum and minimum strength stack and randomly return a value in between.
